subject: Re: Thank you for your recent refinance application, we accepted your refinance appication
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pin money to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you TONIGHT (hurry, this offer will expire TONIGHT):
$414,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
Hurry, when the deal is gone, it is gone. Simply complete this easy form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
http://storeapsagain.com/
